mapper.select: SELECT u.email, u.addr, u.phone, c.codeNm, u.authFg, u.insDt FROM user u INNER JOIN code c ON u.role = c.code AND c.codeGbn = 'ROLE' WHERE u.delDt is null ORDER BY u.id desc
